#summary NeedStats are part of the AntiCultureWorld project.

A *NeedStat* represents a need which [Entity entities] (notably [Human humans]) have. Some needs are vital for an [Entity entity] while some others are just a big disadvantage when not fulfilled or over fulfilled.
